metadata.title: CVE-2024-5197 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: There exists interger overflows in libvpx in versions prior to 1.14.1.Calling vpx_img_alloc() with a large value of the d_w, d_h, or alignparameter may result in integer overflows in the calculations of buffersizes and offsets and some fields of the returned vpx_image_t struct may beinvalid. Calling vpx_img_wrap() with a large value of the d_w, d_h, orstride_align parameter may result in integer overflows in the calculationsof buffer sizes and offsets and some fields of the returned vpx_image_tstruct may be invalid. We recommend upgrading to version 1.14.1 or beyond

criterions.comment: libvpx package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
